org.activiti.workflow.simple.converter.json

类 SimpleWorkflowJsonConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.activiti.workflow.simple.converter.json.SimpleWorkflowJsonConverter

  • public class SimpleWorkflowJsonConverter
extends Object
    A converter capable of converting WorkflowDefinitions from and to a JSON representation.

    Instances of this class are thread-safe.

    作者:
    Frederik Heremans

      • readWorkflowDefinition

        public WorkflowDefinition readWorkflowDefinition(InputStream inputStream)
                                          throws SimpleWorkflowException
        参数:
        inputStream - the stream to read the JSON from.
        返回:
        The workflow definition instance, read from the given input-stream.
        抛出:
        SimpleWorkflowException - when an error occurs while reading or parsing the definition.

      • readWorkflowDefinition

        public WorkflowDefinition readWorkflowDefinition(byte[] bytes)
                                          throws SimpleWorkflowException
        参数:
        bytes - array representing the definition JSON.
        返回:
        The workflow definition instance, parsed from the given array.
        抛出:
        SimpleWorkflowException - when an error occurs while parsing the definition.

      • writeWorkflowDefinition
